faqs.question: How do I contact support?
faqs.answer: Go to Help → Chat with Us in the app to reach support instantly.

faqs.question: Where can I see my order history?
faqs.answer: Open 'My Orders' in the app to view past and current orders.

faqs.question: Can I edit my profile info?
faqs.answer: Yes, go to Profile → Edit to update your details.

faqs.question: What are your working hours?
faqs.answer: Support is available 24/7 for any app-related queries.
